name: INShareFocusStatusIntentHandling
desc: A set of methods an object implements to process intents that share the user’s focus status.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INShareFocusStatusIntent, completion: (INShareFocusStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the details of the request to share the user’s focus status.

items.name: func handle(intent: INShareFocusStatusIntent, completion: (INShareFocusStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the intent that shares the user’s focus status.
